title: Olivia Garden Healthy Hair Paddle Ionic Combo HH-p6
description: The Olivia Garden Healthy Hair HH-P6 is an Ionic Combo paddle that has a special blend of Ionic Bristles and 100% Boar Bristles. It is eco-friendly and made from natural bamboo which is stronger, lighter and more durable than wood. It has Ion-charged bristles which helpes restore hair balance and shine, and makes for faster drying time. It styles better, is anti-static and anti-bacterial.

title: Floxite Fl-10h 10x Hand Held 2-sided Mirror with Stand, Clear
description: This handheld two sided mirror features an 8x distortion free glass on one side and 1x reverse side, plus the included stand allows for hands free use of the 5-inch size mirror,  which allows you to see the tiniest detail even without eyeglasses.

title: NYX Doll Eye Mascara, Extreme Black,  Volume,  DE02, 0.28 oz
description: Hello doll-face! For irresistibly fluttery eyelashes, try this mascara on for size. Doll eye mascara uses a unique blend of natural oils, vitamin E and nylon fibers to extend eyelashes to almost faux proportions. This mascara will add the volume in your lashes that you desire.

title: Three Seven 777 Travel Manicure Pedicure Grooming Kit Set
description: World No. 1, Three Seven 777 Travel Manicure Pedicure Grooming Kit Set - Nail Clipper, Toe Nail Clipper, Cuticle Trimmer, Beauty Scissors, Tweezers, File, Safety Scissors, Double-sided Push Stick, V-Shaped Push Stick, Ear Pick (Total 11 Pcs, Model: TS-16000SVC), Lifetime Warranty - Made in Korea, Since 1975

title: BaByliss Pro BAB2000 Ceramix Xtreme  Dryer
description: Professional long-life motor with 6 speed/heat setting conbinations. Removable filter for easy cleaning. Narrow barrel for maximum air pressure.  Micro concentrator nozzle.
